page.title: 08Leisure&Recreation,Earlston
page.content: There is a lot to do in Earlston in your spare time. Some people go to evening classes which include yoga,woodwork, sewing and keep fit.There is also keep fit in the daytime. The school playing fields are used by the Athletics club.When it is raining the Athletics are held in the games hall. The games hall also has basketball, badminton, indoor football and hockey. There is a bowling club in Earlston and all weather surface tennis courts and also a rugby field and a football field.
